backend/main.mo: Main canister defining product, cart, order, user profile, and category types with admin-gated CRUD logic and seeded demo data using access control mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old actor state to the new format without transforming data fields.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and requirement IDs for admin bootstrap and admin-grant flows.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, auth, admin tools, and seller pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining color variables, theming rules, and global styles for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, layout, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI component showing an access denied message with optional required role and navigation back home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state, loading, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to submit name and email, saving via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and displays a sign‑in prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Checks user role and identity, showing a loading spinner or access‑denied screen if permission is insufficient.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper that includes top navigation, secondary navigation, footer, and page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays site footer with brand info, contact details, legal links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Secondary: Renders a horizontal category navigation bar driven by fetched product categories.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Provides the top navigation bar with logo, search, account menu, cart preview, and mobile navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/storefront/HeroC: Auto‑rotating hero image carousel with navigation controls and CTA buttons linking to product pages.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Promo: Grid of promotional category cards that navigate to filtered product lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, admin actions, and backend interactions using an actor and identity context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, theme variables, fonts, and custom utilities for the app's design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides an admin overview of products, orders, revenue, and tools to assign admin roles by principal or email.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductFor: Form for creating or editing products, loading existing data when editing and submitting changes to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page that lists products with actions to add, edit, and delete, using queries and role protection.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AdminLoginPage.t: Admin login page handling Internet Identity auth, admin checks, owner bootstrap, and redirects based on role.
frontend/src/pages/auth/CustomerLoginPag: Customer login screen using Internet Identity that redirects to home after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart page, fetching cart items, displaying product details, and allowing quantity updates and removals.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the checkout form, computes order totals, validates shipping info, and triggers order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the storefront homepage with hero carousel, promo grid, featured products, and deals sections.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays details of a completed order, fetching order and product data and showing items, totals, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists all user orders with summaries and product previews, handling loading, empty states, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info, handles add‑to‑cart actions, and displays similar products based on category.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays a product catalog with category filters, search support, and responsive filter UI.
frontend/src/pages/seller/SellerDashboar: Empty placeholder page for the seller dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/seller/SellerProductF: Empty placeholder page for the seller product form.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Utility functions for calculating line totals, subtotals, taxes, totals, and formatting prices.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing scope, architecture, known issues, and implemented features of the Nexo Market project.
